root.message: The CONTACT_ORGANISATION field for indicator 4-7-1, translated into all languages

languages.language: UNESCO Education Sector, Division for Peace and Sustainable Development, Section of Education for Sustainable Development (UNESCO-ED/PSD/ESD) and UNESCO Institute for Statistics (UNESCO-UIS),

Secteur de l’éducation de l’UNESCO, Division de la paix et du développement durable, Section de l’éducation au développement durable (UNESCO-SE/DPDD/EDD) et Institut de statistique de l'UNESCO (UNESCO-ISU)
